actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works reported an original measure. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias favorably with amendments. With written report No. 97-12.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 17.
Resolution agreed to in Senate with amendments by Yea-Nay Vote. 93-0. Record Vote No: 26.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the Committee on Environment and Public Works from March 1, 1981, through February 28, 1982, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund of the Senate; (2) employ personnel; and (3) utilize the services of department or agency personnel on a reimbursable basis. Sets forth the limit on expenses by the committee during such period.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
